Token.Abstract: Inherits the UIActionSheetDelegate protocol and adds TTNavigator support.
Sent to the delegate after an action sheet is dismissed from the screen.

Parameter.Name: buttonIndex
Parameter.Abstract: The index of the button that was clicked. The button indices start at 0. If this is the cancel button index, the action sheet is canceling. If -1, the cancel button index is not set.

Parameter.Name: URL
Parameter.Abstract: The URL of the selected button.

ReturnValue.Abstract: YES to open the given URL with TTOpenURL.
